Class: BubbleSeries

insight. BubbleSeries

new insight.BubbleSeries(name, data, x, y, color)

The BubbleSeries class extends the Series class
Name Type Description
name string A uniquely identifying name for this chart
data DataSet The DataSet containing this series' data
x insight.Scales.Scale the x axis
y insight.Scales.Scale the y axis
color object a string or function that defines the color to be used for the items in this series

Methods

#this.radiusFunction(){function}

The function to extract the radius of each bubble from the data objects.
Returns:
The current function used to determine the radius of data objects.

#this.radiusFunction(reversed){this}

Sets the function to extract the radius of each bubble from the data objects.
Name Type Description
reversed boolean The new function to extract the radius of each bubble from the data objects.
